page.title: 07LIVING,LICKEY/CATSHILL
page.content: {Survey We asked these questions to people in Lickey and Catshill with these results: 1.What is your favourite music or group?{pop_5/12 2.What make_up do you use if any? { {Yardley_3/12 3.What colour is the paintwork on your house?{White_4/12 {Hairdressing We visited three hairdressers. Harper's is very posh and expensive whereas Hair Flair and Hazel Robinson's are very friendly but a bit shabby.For example Harper's charge from Â£22 to Â£40 for a perm whereas Hazel Robinson's and Hair Flair charge from Â£7.50 to Â£17.25. The most popular colours of the 80's are blonde and red.
